meanings.sent1: I am reprinting my essay to fix the mistakes.
meanings.sent2: The newspaper is reprinting yesterday's edition due to an error.
meanings.sent3: My printer keeps reprinting the same page over and over by mistake.
meanings.sent4: The teacher is reprinting the test to give students another chance.
meanings.sent5: The author is reprinting the novel with a new cover design.

meanings.definition: A new printing of a book or other printed material
meanings.sent1: The bookstore received a shipment of reprintings of classic novels.
meanings.sent2: The library added the latest reprinting of the encyclopedia to its collection.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally bought two reprintings of the same magazine issue.
meanings.sent4: The museum displayed a rare collection of historical reprintings.
meanings.sent5: The school ordered reprintings of textbooks for the new academic year.
